entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Compression error in br encoding depending on razor cshtml format #44667
  • amr claim lost after ClaimPrincipal renewal #44666
  • Enable CodeQL3000 pipelines across our repos #44662
  • Identity login uses PasswordSignInAsync the wrong way #44660
  • .NET6 Blazor Server - using 'ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute = false' forces UI Component to Reinitialize? #44658

Closed

  • ASP.NET Core 7.0's default authentication handler fallback breaks OpenIddict #44661
  • Blazor WebAssembly client app - enable CORS #44625
  • Blazor Delay in AccessToken being ready and authorized view showing #21448
    Backlog
  • Break on first-chance exception in Web Assembly debugger #42510
    Backlog
  • Hash in service-worker-assets.js is stale after build #41396
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Validation Summary Tag Helper renders style attribute which conflicts with Content Security Policy (CSP) #43714
    .NET 8 Planning
  • ASP.NET Core 5 Standalone Blazor Webassembly Remote Register does not work #29246
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.ListenOptionsHttpsExtensions without reflection ? #31561
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Send 431 when HTTP/2&3 headers are too large or many #44668
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Update CSharp.Common.targets #44665
    area-infrastructure
  • Add more StringSyntaxAttrbute syntaxes #44663
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Support side-by-side transports in Kestrel #44657
    area-runtime
  • Route tooling: Support component routes #44656
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor

Merged

  • Route tooling: Add framework route parameter completion #42910
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • [8.0] Limit the hpack buffer resize #44643 #44654
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2026062 #44664
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Add Json StringSyntaxAttribute syntaxes #44641
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • #42806 removing +1 from previous reconnection attempts #44611
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fixing XML documentation #44523
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.1
  • StringUtilities with xplat-intrinsics (and a little perf-tuning) #44040
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Ability to use user-selected or system culture in RequestLocalizationOptions #44282
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [AuthZ] Add IRequirementData #44342
    area-security, blog-candidate
  • [6.0] Limit the hpack buffer resize #44645
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.12
  • [7.0] Limit the hpack buffer resize #44644
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.1
  • Remove some `GCHandle`s from `SendHeaders()` #44561
    Perf, area-runtime, servers-httpsys
  • [release/7.0] Fixing XML documentation issues for Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Results' methods #44488
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.1
  • Initial Form-binding support #44653
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Update SDK #44601
    area-infrastructure
